All Classes|All Packages

B

backtrack(Board) - Method in class gold_miner.Miner
Action corresponding to backtracking, that is, retracing the previously taken path and finding the earliest square tile in the path stack with an unvisited neighbor; returns true if such a tile can be found; false, otherwise (signaling an invalid board configuration)
BEACON - Static variable in class gold_miner.Board
Character code for a beacon square tile, which returns the distance between this tile and the gold tile, provided that the gold tile is in one of its four cardinal directions and that there is no pit between this tile and the gold tile
BEACON_FOUND - Static variable in class gold_miner.Miner
Character code signifying that a beacon square tile has been reached by this miner
beaconScan(Square) - Method in class gold_miner.Board
Returns the distance between the given beacon and the gold square tile, provided that the gold tile is in one of its four cardinal directions and that there is no pit in between this tile and the gold tile
beginRandomMovement(GameMaster) - Method in class gui.MainScreen
Updates the display depending on the random action chosen by the nonrational agent
beginRationalMovement(LinkedList<String>) - Method in class gui.MainScreen
Updates the display depending on the action executed by the rational agent
Board - Class in gold_miner
Class implementing the board consisting of square tiles explored by the miner either rationally (as a smart agent) or randomly
Board(int, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>, int, int) - Constructor for class gold_miner.Board
Creates a board object given the dimension, the row- and column-coordinates of the beacons, the row- and column-coordinates of the pits, and the row- and column-coordinates of the gold square tile
